definitions.definition: Of something which is consumed (such as money , goods , etc.): Careful or wise in expenditure ; avoiding waste .
Of something which is supplied or used (especially food ): Obtained by or characterized by frugality .

main_definition: Of something which is consumed (such as money , goods , etc.): Careful or wise in expenditure ; avoiding waste .
secondary_definitions: Of something which is supplied or used (especially food ): Obtained by or characterized by frugality .
